messages.content: What is the main feature of the comfyui-clip-with-break extension?
The comfyui-clip-with-break extension provides a CLIP text encoder that uses BREAK formatting like A1111 (uses chained ComfyUI conditioning concat).
What is the purpose of AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak?
AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak provides advanced text encoding, leveraging the code from https://github.com/BlenderNeko/ComfyUI_ADV_CLIP_emb.
How does CLIPTextEncodeWithBreak handle text formatting?
CLIPTextEncodeWithBreak handles text formatting using the BREAK format, such as A1111.
What technique does comfyui-clip-with-break use for chaining conditioning?
The comfyui-clip-with-break extension uses chained ComfyUI conditioning concat for chaining conditioning.
From which repository is the code for AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak derived?
The code for AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak is derived from https://github.com/BlenderNeko/ComfyUI_ADV_CLIP_emb.
